nodes.bodyText: maxAttempts无法表达重试行为是基于用同一个endpoint重试还是lb中再select一个重试
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -21,4 +21,8 @@ servicecomb:
   rateLimiting:
     xxxxx: |
       match: demo-mark
-      rate: 1
\ No newline at end of file
+      rate: 1
+  retry:
+    xxx: |
+      match: none
+      maxAttempts: 3

nodes.bodyText: retry是错误发生时的处理手段，不该是治理类型，容错才是治理类型
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -21,4 +21,8 @@ servicecomb:
   rateLimiting:
     xxxxx: |
       match: demo-mark
-      rate: 1
\ No newline at end of file
+      rate: 1
+  retry:

nodes.bodyText: I noticed that some notes are in Chinese and some are in English. Is it necessary to unify the language of description?

考虑一个最小化配置吧，不要过多暴露太多东西，只要有以下场景定义能力就行：
在一个x的时间窗内，收到大于n次请求，他们的错误率达到百分之y，则触发熔断
除了这三个参数其他一律先不要支持
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -8,3 +8,14 @@ spring:
     servicecomb:
       discovery:
         address: http://127.0.0.1:30100
+
+servicecomb:
+  match:
+    demo-circuitBreaker: |
+      matches:
+        - apiPath:
+            exact: "/circuitBreaker"
+  circuitBreaker:
+    xxx: |
+      match: demo-circuitBreaker
+      minimumNumberOfCalls: 2
